maradane pembrok paudgalika widyayathanayata athulathwa ingrisi adhyapanaya wadidura hadara, badhaka kamkatolu rashiyak mada puwathpath kala wruththiyata piwisiye ya.suriyamal wyaparaya osse wame gaman mangata baddha wu ohu ,horana pradeshaye samasamaja nayakayan samanga samipa sabandatha godananga ganimin dhanapathi wirodhi, adhirajya wirodhi, radala wirodhi jana aragalaya muwahath kaleya. 1947 patan podujana aragalaye asahaya niyamuwaku wu jayalath,1956 podujana wijayagrahanaya udesa horana pradhanawa samastha deshayema janathawage peramunu bala aniya siya abhitha lekhana kalawen saha chathura kathikathwayen sawi shakthimath kaleya.“sinhala jathiya”, “peramuna”, “sarasawi sandarasa” puwathpath mangin aarambha kala puwathpath kala wruththiya osse lankadipa puwathpathata bandunu ohu ,warthakaruwaku, bhasha pariwarthakayaku, wisheshanga lekhakayaku, sinama wicharakayaku washayen wiwidha pathikada osse abhitha ,adina gaman mangakata piwisa, niyojya karthruwarayaku lesa lankadipa puwathpathen mulu mahath lankadipaya pura sadanusmaraniya namayak godananga gaththeya.awiweki puwathpath kala wruththiyedi labunu sulu wiramaya thula nawakatha kshethrayata piwisi jayalath ,1962di sugath - dammi anuwedaniya pem katha puwatha “golu hadawatha” osse pataka lokayata janagatha kaleya.1962 wasare wishishtathama nawakathawa washayen 1963di rajya sammanaya himi karagath jayalathge golu hadawatha bolanda pem kathawak lesa peradeniya gurukulawadin nirdaya wiwechanayata lak kala bawa api yalith sihipath karamu.
